name: Rex de Civilizationes
description:
Rex de Civilizationes is a survival Game by Alrek Studios, inspired by Space Engineers and the SevTech Ages mod for Minecraft.

This is a survival Game focused on the progression through Civilization, which in the end will range from the stone age to space colonization.

The First release was on the 1st of October and included:

  • the first three ages
    • Stone age
    • Copper age
    • Bronze age
  • Wood as a simple means of building
  • a limited non random generated World
